about_the_game:
Ninja "Momochiyo" goes on a journey to exterminate Mononoke.
Let's defeat the cute monster girls that appear one after another!

◆How to fight
1.When Momochiyo meets the Yokai Girl, a battle begins.
2.Knowing your enemy is very important. Touch the Yokai Girl and observe her attack power and characteristics!
3.Choose a card and use the trick! Cards are randomly selected from the constructed deck.SP (skill points) are required to use techniques. (SP will gradually recover as the turn progresses.)
※If you don't see the card you want to use, press the arrow button at the bottom right to select a new card.
4.If you understand the characteristics of the technique well, you are sure that the technique will hit the enemy!
5.Next is the monster girls' turn! The Yokai Girl notices that Momochiyo has come and turns around, and the Yokai Girl who has already turned around attacks.
6.The treasure chests you sometimes find along the way contain new cards! Get more powerful cards and prepare for the monster girls who are getting stronger and stronger! (At this time, you must discard one card you already have. Of course, you can also give up a new card.)
7.The game is over when Momochiyo's health reaches 0. At this time, the deck at that time will be displayed.

In order to advance the battle efficiently and advantageously and eliminate many monster girls, it is important to understand the techniques and enemy characteristics well!

Feel free to post live streaming, fan art, etc. I would be happy if you could spread this game widely!
